title: Tokyo nights type
content:
could someone identify this for me please,  
thank you very much.

 [‹ Eagle but not eagle](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010951/http:/typophile.com/node/47261 "Go to previous forum topic") [Intelligent Life Magazine fonts ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014010951/http:/typophile.com/node/42079 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toby1

comments.content:
TOKYO is Chalet Paris 1960, NIGHTS is Chalet New York 1960, in fact its all Chalet!

JH
